ROOT.RefreshDataLink:
DECLARE @space VARCHAR(50),@gridspace VARCHAR(50),@dsname VARCHAR(50),@dsdesc VARCHAR(50), @dsarg VARCHAR(50),@filter VARCHAR(50),@sysobj VARCHAR(50),@syscol VARCHAR(50),@sysprop VARCHAR(50)
SET @space='{0}' /*数据源对应的数据库名*/ SET @gridspace='{1}' /*DIP600所在的数据库名*/ SET @dsname='{2}' /*对应tbDataSource中的dsname*/ SET @dsdesc='{3}' /*对应tbDataSource中的dsdesc*/ SET @dsarg='{4}' /*对应tbDataSource中的dsarg*/ SET @filter='{5}' /*过滤对应的表(如流程,用逗号分割)*/
IF exists(select charindex('2000',t.a) from (select substring(@@VERSION,0,27) a) t) BEGIN SET @sysobj='dbo.sysobjects' SET @syscol='dbo.syscolumns' SET @sysprop='dbo.sysproperties' END ELSE BEGIN SET @sysobj='sys.objects' SET @syscol='sys.columns' SET @sysprop='sys.extended_properties' END
DECLARE @sql VARCHAR(8000) IF(len(@gridspace)>0) SET @sql='USE '+@gridspace+'' SET @sql=@sql+' delete from tbDataSource where dsname ='''+@dsname+''' delete from tbDataTable where dsname ='''+@dsname+''' delete from tbDataColumn where dsname ='''+@dsname+''' ' SET @sql=@sql+' INSERT INTO tbDataSource(dsname,dstype,dsdesc,dsarg) VALUES('''+@dsname+''',0,'''+@dsdesc+''','''+@dsarg+''')' SET @sql=@sql+' DECLARE @name VARCHAR(50)' IF(len(@space)>0) SET @sql=@sql+' USE '+@space+'' SET @sql=@sql+' DECLARE cur0 CURSOR FOR SELECT name FROM '+@sysobj+' WHERE xtype=''U''' IF(len(@filter)>0) SET @sql=@sql+' AND name not like ''%'+replace(@filter,',','%'' and name not like ''%')+'%'' ' SET @sql=@sql+'OPEN cur0 FETCH next FROM cur0 INTO @name WHILE @@FETCH_STATUS=0 BEGIN' IF(len(@gridspace)>0) SET @sql=@sql+' USE '+@gridspace+'' SET @sql=@sql+' IF(NOT EXISTS(SELECT * FROM tbDataTable WHERE dsname='''+@dsname+''' AND tblname=@name AND tbldesc=@name ))' SET @sql=@sql+' INSERT INTO tbDataTable (dsname,tblname,tbldesc) VALUES('''+@dsname+''',@name,@name) FETCH next FROM cur0 INTO @name END CLOSE cur0 DEALLOCATE cur0' SET @sql=@sql+' DECLARE @tablename VARCHAR(50)' IF(len(@gridspace)>0) SET @sql=@sql+' USE '+@gridspace+'' SET @sql=@sql+' DECLARE cur1 CURSOR FOR SELECT tblname FROM tbDataTable OPEN cur1 FETCH next FROM cur1 INTO @tablename' SET @sql=@sql+' WHILE @@FETCH_STATUS=0 BEGIN DECLARE @colname VARCHAR(50) DECLARE @coldesc VARCHAR(50) ' IF(len(@space)>0) SET @sql=@sql+' USE '+@space+'' SET @sql=@sql+' DECLARE cur2 CURSOR FOR SELECT a.name,CAST(CASE WHEN b.value IS NULL THEN a.name ELSE b.value END AS VARCHAR(100)) AS ''desc'' FROM '+@syscol+' a LEFT JOIN '+@sysprop+' b ON a.id=b.id AND a.colid=b.smallid WHERE a.id in (SELECT id FROM '+@sysobj+' WHERE name=@tablename) OPEN cur2 FETCH next FROM cur2 INTO @colname,@coldesc WHILE @@FETCH_STATUS=0 BEGIN' IF(len(@gridspace)>0) SET @sql=@sql+' USE '+@gridspace+'' SET @sql=@sql+' IF(NOT EXISTS(SELECT * FROM tbDataColumn WHERE dsname='''+@dsname+''' AND tblname=@tablename AND colname=@colname)) INSERT INTO tbDataColumn (dsname,tblname,colname,coldesc) VALUES('''+@dsname+''',@tablename,@colname,@coldesc)' SET @sql=@sql+' FETCH next FROM cur2 INTO @colname,@coldesc END CLOSE cur2 DEALLOCATE cur2 FETCH next FROM cur1 INTO @tablename END CLOSE cur1 DEALLOCATE cur1'
EXEC(@sql)
ROOT.GetConfigGroup: SELECT DISTINCT cfggroup FROM dbPDPConfig WHERE cfggroup<>'' and busing=1 ORDER BY cfggroup
ROOT.GetConfigsByGroup: SELECT * FROM dbPDPConfig WHERE cfggroup='{0}' and busing=1 order by cfgname
ROOT.GetOptionDescByName: SELECT cfgOptionValue,cfgOptionDesc FROM dbPDPConfigOptionList WHERE cfgname='{0}'
ROOT.GetTableByValues: SELECT keyname,keydesc,keytype,defvalue,iscommon FROM tbCtrlConfig WHERE tagname='{0}' AND cfgname='{1}'
ROOT.GetCtrlOptions: SELECT optionvalue,optiondesc FROM tbListCtrlOption WHERE cfgid=( SELECT TOP 1 cfgid FROM tbCtrlConfig WHERE tagname='{0}' AND keyname='{1}') ORDER BY optiondesc
ROOT.GetModuleInfo: (SELECT l.* FROM tbModuleInfo l left join tbModuleInfo m on l.pmoduleid=m.moduleid) a
